Name: Thy
description:
Thy is 62 years old and is a widowed woman living with her father and sister. She sells food as shown in the picture. Her sister is buying and selling vegetables. For one year, she has been running this business, and more competitors is her major challenge.

She will use this loan to rebuild her food store. This loan would help her get more income and change her family's living standards in the future.Thy wants to renovate her house and expand her business to be bigger in the future.
